shortSummary: Software Engineer with 4+ years of hands-on experience designing, developing, and maintaining robust applications using the Microsoft .NET ecosystem. Proficient in C#, .NET Core, VB.NET, WinForms, and SQL Server, with strong experience building both modern microservice-based systems and maintaining business-critical legacy applications. I have worked extensively across retail, financial, and accounting domains, delivering stable, scalable, and user-focused solutions that support real-world business operations.
summary:
Software Engineer with 4+ years of hands-on experience designing, developing, and maintaining robust applications using the Microsoft .NET ecosystem. Proficient in C#, .NET Core, VB.NET, WinForms, and SQL Server, with strong experience building both modern microservice-based systems and maintaining business-critical legacy applications. I have worked extensively across retail, financial, and accounting domains, delivering stable, scalable, and user-focused solutions that support real-world business operations.

I bring practical expertise in payment system integrations, including onboarding and supporting multiple providers, improving transaction flows, and ensuring secure, reliable processing. My experience spans cloud-native and hybrid environments, with solid exposure to Azure services for deployment, monitoring, configuration, and application performance insights. I am comfortable working across the full development lifecycleâ€”from requirement analysis and system design to development, testing, deployment, and production support.

Known for my strong problem-solving and debugging skills, I thrive in fast-paced environments where reliability and performance are critical. I have a proven ability to manage complex systems under tight timelines, independently own features or applications, and contribute effectively within Agile/Scrum teams. I value clean code, maintainability, and thoughtful design, while also balancing business priorities and technical constraints.

Beyond technical skills, I am recognized for clear communication, cross-team collaboration, and a proactive mindset. I enjoy working closely with stakeholders, consultants, and end users to understand real needs and translate them into effective technical solutions. Driven by continuous learning, I actively explore new technologies, cloud patterns, and AI-assisted development tools to improve productivity and software quality. My goal is to build dependable systems that create measurable impact while continuously growing as an engineer.

tools.name: Visual Studio / VS Code
tools.description: Primary IDEs for .NET development, debugging, and code analysis

tools.name: Azure Services
tools.description: App Services, Service Bus, Storage, AppInsights for cloud deployment and monitoring

tools.description: Version control, branching strategies, and collaborative development workflows

tools.description: API testing, REST endpoint validation, and integration testing

tools.description: Database management, query optimization, and performance tuning

tools.name: Claude Code / AI Tools
tools.description: AI-assisted development, code generation, and productivity enhancement

experience.description: Developing and maintaining microservices-based POS applications and payment integrations
achievements: Contribute 80% of work to developing and maintaining services using C#, .NET Framework, and .NET Core within a microservices architecture.
Build and enhance Retail Point of Sale (POS) applications and APIs using REST principles, OAuth2, and JWT-based authentication.
Implement and support payment integrations, including onboarding Nordic providers such as Walley, Adyen, and Vipps, and improving existing payment flows.
Work with Azure services (App Services, Service Bus, Storage, AppInsights, etc.) for deployment, monitoring, configuration, and cloud operations.
Maintain POS applications across both on-premise and cloud-based environments, ensuring seamless store operations.
Collaborate in an Agile/Scrum team, participating in sprint planning, stand-ups, reviews, and iterative delivery.
Independently manage a legacy VB.NET WinForms POS application in the remaining 20% of time, handling development, testing, release cycles, and feature updates.
Provide support to consultants, internal teams, and customers by assisting in major incidents, troubleshooting production issues, and ensuring timely resolution.

experience.description: Developed accounting software and enhanced financial products
achievements: Developed core modules for a new accounting software and enhanced financial products like E-Proceeding using VB.NET, SQL Server, and Visual Studio.
Led requirement gathering and user-focused design discussions with senior management to shape new software components.
Performed SQL Server query optimization to reduce server load, improve performance, and enhance application responsiveness.
Improved user experience by resolving tickets, coordinating fixes with developers, and optimizing internal workflows.
Conducted code reviews, guided team members, and maintained high code quality standards.

education.description: Course work in Information/Computer Science. Scored 8.53 CGPA.

projects.name: Privacy-First Portfolio Website
projects.description: Modern responsive portfolio built with Angular 19, Cloudflare Workers, and KV storage for privacy-first data management
highlights: Terminal-inspired cyberpunk design theme with ambient effects
Serverless API with Cloudflare Workers and KV storage
Complete privacy: Personal data stored in KV, not in public repo
Intelligent caching system reducing API calls by 67%
CI/CD with GitHub Actions for automated deployment
